entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of drizzle. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle this evening then 30 percent chance of snow after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:53 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
